title: Unexpected trait resolution overflow error

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-beta
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to beta.

labels.name: E-needs-bisection
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs bisection: https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo-bisect-rustc

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

labels.name: ICEBreaker-Cleanup-Crew
labels.description: Helping to "clean up" bugs with minimal examples and bisections

body:
Trying to compile [`wundergraph_example`](https://github.com/weiznich/wundergraph/tree/ffbb883eea169d1750659e038d7051a84b21f6e7/wundergraph_example) with recent nightly's or the current beta (` rustc 1.46.0-beta.2 (6f959902b 2020-07-23`) compiler fails with the attached error message. The compilation suceeds without warning using the latest stable (`rustc 1.45.0 (5c1f21c3b 2020-07-13)`) release.
Error message

``` error[E0275]: overflow evaluating the requirement `<::Query as diesel::query_dsl::boxed_dsl::BoxedDsl<'_, DB>>::Output` --> wundergraph_example/src/mutations.rs:73:1 | 73 | / wundergraph::mutation_object! { 74 | | /// Global mutation object for the schema 75 | | Mutation { 76 | | Hero(insert = NewHero, update = HeroChangeset,), ... | 81 | | } 82 | | } | |_^ | = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `wundergraph::query_builder::mutations::HandleUpdate` for `Hero_table` = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `juniper::GraphQLType` for `mutations::Mutation` = note: this error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info) error[E0275]: overflow evaluating the requirement `<::Query as diesel::query_dsl::boxed_dsl::BoxedDsl<'_, DB>>::Output` --> wundergraph_example/src/mutations.rs:73:1 | 73 | / wundergraph::mutation_object! { 74 | | /// Global mutation object for the schema 75 | | Mutation { 76 | | Hero(insert = NewHero, update = HeroChangeset,), ... | 81 | | } 82 | | } | |_^ | = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `wundergraph::query_builder::mutations::HandleUpdate` for `Hero_table` = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `juniper::GraphQLType` for `mutations::Mutation_wrapper<'a, Ctx>` = note: this error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info) error[E0275]: overflow evaluating the requirement `<::Query as diesel::query_dsl::boxed_dsl::BoxedDsl<'_, DB>>::Output` --> wundergraph_example/src/mutations.rs:73:1 | 73 | / wundergraph::mutation_object! { 74 | | /// Global mutation object for the schema 75 | | Mutation { 76 | | Hero(insert = NewHero, update = HeroChangeset,), ... | 81 | | } 82 | | } | |_^ | = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `wundergraph::query_builder::mutations::HandleUpdate` for `Hero_table` = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `juniper::GraphQLType` for `mutations::Mutation_inner<'a, Ctx>` = note: this error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info) error[E0275]: overflow evaluating the requirement `<::Query as diesel::query_dsl::boxed_dsl::BoxedDsl<'_, DB>>::Output` --> wundergraph_example/src/mutations.rs:73:1 | 73 | / wundergraph::mutation_object! { 74 | | /// Global mutation object for the schema 75 | | Mutation { 76 | | Hero(insert = NewHero, update = HeroChangeset,), ... | 81 | | } 82 | | } | |_^ | = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `wundergraph::query_builder::mutations::HandleUpdate` for `Hero_table` = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `juniper::GraphQLType` for `mutations::Mutation` = note: this error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info) error[E0275]: overflow evaluating the requirement `<::Query as diesel::query_dsl::boxed_dsl::BoxedDsl<'_, DB>>::Output` --> wundergraph_example/src/mutations.rs:73:1 | 73 | / wundergraph::mutation_object! { 74 | | /// Global mutation object for the schema 75 | | Mutation { 76 | | Hero(insert = NewHero, update = HeroChangeset,), ... | 81 | | } 82 | | } | |_^ | = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `wundergraph::query_builder::mutations::HandleUpdate` for `Hero_table` = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `juniper::GraphQLType` for `mutations::Mutation` = note: this error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info) error[E0275]: overflow evaluating the requirement `<::Query as diesel::query_dsl::boxed_dsl::BoxedDsl<'_, DB>>::Output` --> wundergraph_example/src/mutations.rs:73:1 | 73 | / wundergraph::mutation_object! { 74 | | /// Global mutation object for the schema 75 | | Mutation { 76 | | Hero(insert = NewHero, update = HeroChangeset,), ... | 81 | | } 82 | | } | |_^ | = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `wundergraph::query_builder::mutations::HandleUpdate` for `Hero_table` = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `juniper::GraphQLType` for `mutations::Mutation_wrapper<'a, Ctx>` = note: this error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info) error[E0275]: overflow evaluating the requirement `<::Query as diesel::query_dsl::boxed_dsl::BoxedDsl<'_, DB>>::Output` --> wundergraph_example/src/mutations.rs:73:1 | 73 | / wundergraph::mutation_object! { 74 | | /// Global mutation object for the schema 75 | | Mutation { 76 | | Hero(insert = NewHero, update = HeroChangeset,), ... | 81 | | } 82 | | } | |_^ | = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `wundergraph::query_builder::mutations::HandleUpdate` for `Hero_table` = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `juniper::GraphQLType` for `mutations::Mutation_inner<'a, Ctx>` = note: this error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info) error[E0275]: overflow evaluating the requirement `<::Query as diesel::query_dsl::boxed_dsl::BoxedDsl<'_, DB>>::Output` --> wundergraph_example/src/mutations.rs:73:1 | 73 | / wundergraph::mutation_object! { 74 | | /// Global mutation object for the schema 75 | | Mutation { 76 | | Hero(insert = NewHero, update = HeroChangeset,), ... | 81 | | } 82 | | } | |_^ | = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `wundergraph::query_builder::mutations::HandleUpdate` for `Hero_table` = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `juniper::GraphQLType` for `mutations::Mutation_inner<'a, Ctx>` = note: this error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info) error[E0275]: overflow evaluating the requirement `<::Query as diesel::query_dsl::boxed_dsl::BoxedDsl<'_, DB>>::Output` --> wundergraph_example/src/mutations.rs:73:1 | 73 | / wundergraph::mutation_object! { 74 | | /// Global mutation object for the schema 75 | | Mutation { 76 | | Hero(insert = NewHero, update = HeroChangeset,), ... | 81 | | } 82 | | } | |_^ | = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `wundergraph::query_builder::mutations::HandleUpdate` for `Hero_table` = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `juniper::GraphQLType` for `mutations::Mutation_inner<'a, Ctx>` = note: this error originates in a macro (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info) error: aborting due to 12 previous errors For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0275`. error: could not compile `wundergraph_example`. ```

`cargo bisect-rustc` found that the regression happened in `nightly-2020-06-21`
